rukus.text: 14|13|avisvasikal tannalilekkulla daivadutanmareat parannu: nannalute nattil ninn ninnale nannal purattakkuka tanne ceyyum. allatta paksam ninnal nannalute matattilekk tiriccuvanne tiru. appeal avarkk (a dutanmarkk‌) avarute raksitav sandesam nalki. tirccayayum nam a akramikale nasippikkuka tanne ceyyum
14|14|avarkku sesam ninnale nam nattil adhivasippikkukayum ceyyunnatan‌. enre sthanatte bhayappetukayum, enre takkitine bhayappetukayum ceytavarkkullatan a anugraham
14|15|avar (a dutanmar) vijayattinayi (allahuveat‌) apeksiccu. et durvasikkaranaya sarvvadhipatiyum parajayappetukayum ceytu
14|16|avanre pinnale tanneyunt narakam. cearayum calavum kalarnna niril ninnayirikkum avann kutikkan nalkappetunnat‌

14|17|atavan kilpeattirakkan sramikkum. at teantayil ninn irakkan avann kalinnekkukayilla. ellayitatt ninnum maranam avanre nerkk varum. ennal avan maranappetukayilla tanum. atinre pinnale tanneyunt kathearamaya vereyum siksa

14|18|tannalute raksitavine nisedhiccavare, avarute karm'mannale upamikkavunnat keatunkarrulla oru divasam kanatta karraticcu parippeaya vennirineatakunnu. avar pravartticcuntakkiyatil ninn yateannum anubhavikkan avarkk sadhikkunnatalla. at tanneyan viduramaya margabhransam
14|19|akasannalum bhumiyum allahu sariyaya kramattilan srsticcittullatenn ni kantille? avan uddesikkunna paksam ninnale avan nikkam ceyyukayum, oru putiya srstiye avan keant varikayum ceyyunnatan‌

14|21|avarellavarum allahuvinkalekk purappett vannirikkukayan‌. appealata durbalar ahankariccirunnavareat parayunnu: tirccayayum nannal ninnalute anuyayikalayirunnallea. akayal allahuvinre siksayil ninn alpamenkilum ninnal nannalil ninn olivakkittarumea? avar (ahankariccirunnavar) parayum: allahu nannale nervaliyilakkiyirunnenkil nannal ninnaleyum nervaliyilakkumayirunnu. nam'me sambandhiccetattealam nam ksamaket kaniccalum ksamiccalum oru pealeyakunnu. namukk yatearu raksamargavumilla
